properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm; Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 8:34PM PST until February 8 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas 13 to 18 feet at 11 seconds expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 11 to 16 feet expected.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino out 10 nm, Cape
Mendocino to Pt Arena out 10 nm and Pt St George to Cape
Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 3 PM Saturday to 9
AM PST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 4 AM to 3 PM
PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or cause
damage to vessels.
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for rough seas and consider remaining in port
until hazardous seas subside.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM PST SUNDAY
